SELECT MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ID , LAYER , SN , PARENT_ID , NAME , CHILDREN_COMPONENT , VALUE_COMPONENT1 , VALUE_COMPONENT2 , PRESENTATION_ITEM_SET_NO ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS
FROM MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0

UPDATE MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION SET
LAYER = :LAYER ,SN = :SN ,SIGN_DIVISION = :SIGN_DIVISION ,NAME = :NAME ,CHILDREN_COMPONENT = :CHILDREN_COMPONENT ,VALUE_COMPONENT1 = :VALUE_COMPONENT1 ,VALUE_COMPONENT2 = :VALUE_COMPONENT2 ,PRESENTATION_ITEM_SET_NO = :PRESENTATION_ITEM_SET_NO
,DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG ,SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG ,VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID ,DATA_NO = :DATA_NO ,USER_KEY = :USER_KEY ,RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE ,RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID ,TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ID = :MS_SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ID AND TS = :TS
